parameter.name: owner
parameter.description: The owner of the repository having the specified issue.

parameter.name: repo
parameter.description: The repository to retrieve issue from.

parameter.name: assignee
parameter.description: Login for the user that this issue should be assigned to.

parameter.name: milestone
parameter.description: Milestone to associate this issue with.

parameter.name: labels
parameter.description: Labels to associate with this issue.
